testcase.name: User navigate to registration page if they did not register yet
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed And user clicks on the username textbox and text invalid username...........passed And user clicks on the password textbox and text invalid password...........passed And user clicks on the sign in button.......................................passed Then user verify the error message..........................................passed And user clicks on this text "You don't have an account yet? Register a new account".passed Then user verify the Registration page......................................passed
